entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Drayton Valley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming south 20 km/h late this morning. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 42 this morning and minus 21 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 26. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 24 February 2023
